channel.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
channel.description:
[url='https://www.pcgamer.com/2011/08/23/aliens-colonial-marines-trailer-has-alien-queen-frantic-door-welding-screaming/']https://www.pcgamer.com/2011/08/23/aliens-colonial-marines-trailer-has-alien-queen-frantic-door-welding-screaming/[/url]
THIS is what AVP should have been.
Discuss.

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
It was called Aliens TC, and no, it was not made by ID. ID wanted to make an aliens game but didn’t get the rights.

That escape mode looks pretty cool, like Evac from AvP 2.

I really hope they have a last stand type mode as well though.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Gasher
item.description:
Shit, I actually hope it doesn’t have a bunch of story and/or cutscenes etc… that is just less time wasting xenos (or Space Marines - if you are into that sort of thing). Great mapping, lighting, sound, AI and multiplayer are pretty much all I am worried about. Wait a sec… that is a lot!

But I have a strong feeling that the dialogue between these blokes is going to be quite retarded… my gut (and years of mild retardation) tells me this… This can be fun/funny for sure, but often gets old VERY fast… Duke, anyone?.. I actually have a hard time seeing anyone (outside of VALVe, perhaps) pulling this off in a non-retarded way… All kinds of macho-bullshit-banter all over the joint. You wait.

Has anyone here (if yer old enough) played the Aliens Mod for Doom?.. this was something like '94 or some shit like that… was my first experience with a mod. I don’t feel like doing research, but it seems like that was actually made by iD… that possible?
I just remember a lot of “Let’s rock!!” etc and it sounding kinda crappy… jesus that was so long ago…

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Problematic_A-hole
item.description:
Man, sweet, but if anyone’s expecting this story to be in Alien or Aliens quality, I’m pretty sure they’re going to be dissapointed

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
The whole game looks so damn cheesy – it better be fun as hell, because I’m sure the story is going to be retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Gasher
item.description:
Sweet!.. but dang, I thought this was coming out in September… either I had that all wrong - or they pushed it back… oh well, will be worth the wait for sure. We will all have plenty of time to get our Bill Paxton lines down real good!.. Think I will start practicing… “I say we grease this rat-fuck-son-of-a-bitch right now!”…

Read full topic

Fuck. YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Yeah. Also apparently it wasn’t removed completely, somebody playing the build actually managed to burn to death once.

Also, they said they have a neutralizing base you apply to cancel the acid out, and in one of the videos you can see a really nice burning effect the acid does to the metal floor so I doubt they would include that but make it not damage you

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
They should explode like this

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HQDy-5IQvuU&feature=player_detailpage#t=79s

Also I really fucking want some sort of portable laptop for sentry guns in multiplayer so we can read the ammo like that after we deploy them, maybe in the horde mode or something

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Finally.

On topic, I was watching the behind the scenes docs for the anthology, and I noticed that the game is seriously missing something very important to the look of the film. The Xenos don’t smoke when bullets hit them.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
xalener:

Simple games 101. 99 rounds out the box would be OP as hell.

xalener:

Then again, agains 103 or more xenos, a deeper mag may be desirable.

xalener:

If they have an EXP system like COD or Battlefield (from the sound of it, they may), I hope they don’t use stupid inflated numbers like 105 points per kill, and keep it closer to 50 or below. [COLOR=‘Black’]Dude, how long is this gonna take?

xalener:

Alright this is pissing me off. 110.

You guys should have noticed by now.

xalener:

That’s wrong in about 112 ways.

I laughed.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
As an Alien purist, the whole concept of a queen is cop out bullshit imo. I can’t really complain.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: elevenbravo
item.description:
Yeah and I just don’t give a fuck. I’m a huge Aliens fan but not a purist. Otherwise I’d be raging about BULL aliens and no Praetorians. IF YOU CAN BECOME A QUEEN ITS ONLY NATURAL THAT THERE WOULD BE ROYAL GUARDS AROUND AOGHKAFDHOF.AFDHFFFFFFF

Yeah okay, maybe I do care.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens : Colonial Marines
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I complained about that so much but I’m getting used to them for some reason.

They might change it as they said they got a lot of feedback on the MT.

Maybe red dots will be for normal servers and white for hardcore?
